languages.text: "Знать, как всегда, думает о знати. А мои мысли занимают поставки от целой планеты, оружие и технологии, что теперь не получит Империум. Вот что тяжкий удар".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed the Kiava Gamma quest.
Abelard: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."

traits.locale_text: "Знать, как всегда, думает о знати. А мои мысли занимают поставки от целой планеты, оружие и технологии, что теперь не получит Империум. Вот, что тяжкий удар".

languages.text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed the Kiava Gamma quest.
Abelard: "What transpired on Kiava Gamma will be a heavy blow to the Gaprak dynasty, I suspect... I just hope their rivals on Dargonus do not devour the Gapraks completely after this."
languages.original_text: "Знать, как всегда, думает о знати. А мои мысли занимают поставки от целой планеты, оружие и технологии, что теперь не получит Империум. Вот что тяжкий удар".

"As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

languages.text: 「いつものことだが、貴族は貴族のことばかりを気にかける。だが俺が問題にしているのは、帝国が本来受け取るはずだった、それも惑星一つ分にも及ぶ兵器と技術が、今や失われたという事実だ。それこそが真の痛手だというのに」
languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

traits.locale_text: 「いつものことだが、貴族は貴族のことばかりを気にかける。だが俺が問題にしているのは、帝国が本来受け取るはずだった、それも惑星一つ分にも及ぶ兵器と技術が、今や失われたという事実だ。それこそが真の痛手だというのに」

languages.text: Wie immer sorgt sich der Adelige um den Adel. Ich sorge mich um einen Planeten voller Waffen und Technologie, die das Imperium nun nicht erhält. Das ist hier der schwere Schlag."
languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

traits.locale_text: Wie immer sorgt sich der Adelige um den Adel. Ich sorge mich um einen Planeten voller Waffen und Technologie, die das Imperium nun nicht erhält. Das ist hier der schwere Schlag."

languages.text: « Comme à son habitude, le noble se soucie de la noblesse. Ce qui me préoccupe, moi, ce sont toutes les armes et les technologies de cette planète que l'Imperium ne recevra jamais. C'est ça, le véritable coup dur. »
languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

traits.locale_text: « Comme à son habitude, le noble se soucie de la noblesse. Ce qui me préoccupe, moi, ce sont toutes les armes et les technologies de cette planète que l'Imperium ne recevra jamais. C'est ça, le véritable coup dur. »

languages.text: «Como siempre, al noble le preocupa la nobleza. A mí lo que me preocupa es el tributo planetario de armas y tecnologías que el Imperium ya no va a recibir. Eso sí que es un duro revés».
languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

traits.locale_text: «Como siempre, al noble le preocupa la nobleza. A mí lo que me preocupa es el tributo planetario de armas y tecnologías que el Imperium ya no va a recibir. Eso sí que es un duro revés».

languages.text: “还是老样子，贵族只会担心贵族的事情。我更担忧的是帝国失去了那颗行星的所有武器与技术，这会是个沉重的打击。”
languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

traits.locale_text: “还是老样子，贵族只会担心贵族的事情。我更担忧的是帝国失去了那颗行星的所有武器与技术，这会是个沉重的打击。”

languages.text: "Soyluların tek derdi, her zamanki gibi soyları. Beni endişelendiren, koca bir gezegen değerindeki silahların ve teknolojinin İmparatorluk'un eline geçemeyecek olması. Asıl darbe de bu."
languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."

traits.locale_text: "Soyluların tek derdi, her zamanki gibi soyları. Beni, koca bir gezegen değerindeki silah ve teknolojinin İmparatorluk'un eline geçemeyecek olması endişelendiriyor, asıl darbe de bu."

languages.original_text: "As always, the nobleman worries about the nobility. What I am concerned with is a planet's worth of weapons and technology that the Imperium is not going to receive now. That is the heavy blow here."
